name: HCR
description:
Was not able to finish this one.

Prototype for GBJAM 5. Got my alarm set for early morning to see if I can finish this before the deadline!

The idea is simple: you race (using arrow keys) towards the goal. The background color will tell you whether you are HOT (red - getting closer to the goal) or COLD (blue - getting further away from the goal.)

In the meantime you can check out my earlier submission:

A small reflex timer arcade game: Slash Mr. M

A Portal-like 2D puzzler with 10 levels: T-SWAP
